title: HA0-QK438-DOUGLAS RECREATION CENTER
location: FREDERICK DOUGLASS CT & STANTON TER SE
description: The community surrounding the Douglas Recreation Center has grown and the existing facility is not meeting the needs of the community. This project will allow for much needed additional programming and educational spaces in a better facility. The project will consist of planning, design, and construction of spaces such as indoor play spaces, an indoor gymnasium, classrooms, and multi-purpose rooms.
justification: DPR is requesting funds in FY 2011 and 2012 to expand this recreation center in Ward 8.
progress_assessment: Planning for this project should begin in 2010 and construction in FY 2011 is appropriate.
related_projects: None Milestone Data Projected Actual Environmental Approvals Design Start (FY) Design Complete (FY) Construction Start (FY) 10/01/2011 Construction Complete (FY) 11/01/2012 Closeout (FY) 01/31/2013
